name: clicomp
keywords: cli components library pane progress colors cursor navigation

scripts.examples: node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js -w examples/src -d examples/bin | nodemon examples/bin/index.js --watch examples/bin --watch lib
scripts.sandbox: npm run watch & npm run examples
scripts.coverage: node_modules/.bin/babel-node node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-register --require babel-polyfill --recursive tests
scripts.push: git push origin && git push github

author: ranapat@gmail.com
